Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset=utf-8

Tucson heaves a sigh.  

" I meant to call Rodimus, Perceptor, Rattrap and =
Windlord back to the ark in an alternate fashion rather than the con link. =
 I'm sensing another interruption in our communications system.  I apologiz=
e if I've startled any of you close by.  Still no word from them..  Surely =
they would have heard that. "

He was now very concerned for the welfare of=
 Rodimus, Windlord, Perceptor and Rattrap.  He gives Talon the babies once =
more and gets back into beast mode.

" Leo, watch over operations while I'm=
 gone.  Lord Elder, inform me at once if you hear anything pertaining to Ro=
dimus and the others.  I know where I must go, but do not know what I will =
find. "

He gives Talon a gentile rub on her face with his snout and does t=
he same for his babies.

" Stay strong for me, I will return as soon as I c=
an.  That's a promise."

He now walks out with a stern stride and extends h=
is wings, lifting himself off the ground, stirring up debris in mini cyclon=
es around him as he takes flight.  His armor shimmers brilliantly as it cat=
ches the light of the sky, appearing almost like lightning as his long tail=
 trails behind him.

Once in the air, he gives another beacon roar, even lo=
uder than the first, to see if Rodimus and the others can hear him.  This i=
ntern sounds just like a boom of thunder which has a habit of rattling the =
ground somewhat.  Yes there be a dragon soaring over the skies as Tucsons s=
hadow is cast over the entrance of the cave where the Enemy was last seen. =
 Another booming roar confirms his arrival as he circles the area.

Local a=
rtist who specializes in illustration, using traditional and digital media.=
  

I also specialize in hand made crafts.  Great for any occasion!  

Need=
 a great gift idea that is original?  No problem!  Email me at this address=
 and we will talk.  

On Jul 10, 2012, at 9:03 AM, Super Cyclonus <supercyc=
lonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Tucson gently places his babies =
back in the care of their mother as he gets
> > back into beast mode.
> >
>=
 > " I will send out a call beacon and see if that gathers any response."
>=
 >
> > He exits the Ark and stands atop the vessel, letting out a loud but =
non
> > aggressive roar that he hoped would be heard by the others. He give=
s three
> > loud bellows, and then waits to hear its response.
> 
> OOC: I =
am not sure which others TUCSON is calling for. The dragons or
> other Maxi=
mals.
> 
> <BIC>
> 
> TUCSON's roar echoed out over the landscape, like thu=
nder it bounced
> and echoed, is deep reverberous sound bouncing off mounta=
in peaks and
> valleys for miles.
> 
> Birds scatter into the air and anima=
ls flee as the sound startled them
> into flight.
> 
> However there does n=
ot appear to be any other answer from anyone away
> from the ARK.
> 
> Howe=
ver he does get a few calls closer to home . . .
> 
> "Was that you Tucson?=
" Came a call from LORD ELDER.
> 
> A call from LEO PRIME came in as well, =
"Tucson, was that your roar!"
> 
> WOLFGANG looked over at TUCSON and then =
continued on guard patrol.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> - Preston
> 

--Apple-Mail-7122D240-4379-40AA-AC9C-0F82D002CCCA
